name: Loophole (Louis Denizet)
description:
Ludum dare 47 - Stuck in a loop

Youtube Video


I made a very litteral interpretation of the theme with a minimalistic art style as I do not know how to do more complex art! I took a flat design color palette to try staying coherent.

Controls : 

Left click : create right rotation circle
right click : create left rotation circle
numpad 1 : activate camera centered on active circle
numpad 2 : activate camera centered on player position
numpad 3 : activates default camera following mouse

I made the code on Construct 3 game engine and I really hope you enjoy the game concept there!

Known issue : in certain cases the walls do not open, I could not fix in time!
